author: thuer
body:
Backport of the changes in 81X (#13756) 

Adding the possibility of additional weights (scale / pdf variation) for Sherpa 2.2. Sherpa stores the weights in form of named weights which we do not do in CMSSW, so the relevant names are stored in GenLumiInfoHeader for further use.
title: Cmssw 80 x sherpa weights
